details.name: Material
details.value: Merbau wooden frame & floor, tempered glass, Imported acrylic

details.name: Function
details.value:
Temperature/Time setting, Top color changing light, 4.5KW steam generator,

Top part is one whole unite ceiling

details.name: Others
details.value:
1.The material of wooden frame & floor is optional.
2.The acrylic can be Chinese acrylic or ABS.
3.Domestic steam generator can upgrade to Imported Harvia 10.8KW steam generator.
